seo: PandoraFMS,os命令注入,漏洞检测,网络安全
summary: 该插件用于检测PandoraFMS系统中是否存在OS命令注入漏洞，通过构造特定的POST请求并结合DNSLog验证漏洞是否存在。
summary_en: This plugin is used to detect OS command injection vulnerabilities in the PandoraFMS system by constructing specific POST requests and combining them with DNSLog to verify the existence of vulnerabilities.
